Name: Arrog
About the game: Please support our next title! / Arrog is an enigmatic puzzle adventure game featuring hand-drawn art and set in a bizarre black-and-white world with color accents. Features A tale about the journey of a man accepting his death through his dreams. A unique black-and-white art style and traditional animations used in a bizarre world. An intense 30-minute narrative experience. A hand-crafted soundtrack for each section of the game.
